shows.title: The Rising with Martyn Joseph
shows.desc: Festival favourite and troubadour Martyn Joseph gathers together some of the best singer-songwriters at the festival, digging into their creative mindset and craft. Collaborations, informal jamming and rare candour from great Greenbelt artists.

shows.title: Old Man Luedecke
shows.desc: Old Man Luedecke is the nom de plume of Canadian roots singer-songwriter Christopher Luedecke. With deceptively simple songs accompanied by banjo and guitar, Christopher has appeared at countless major folk festivals across the world and keeps up a steady touring programme. His authentic body of work draws on a lifetime of reading, woodshedding, bike touring and hitchhiking.
